item.title: This PPP is a colossal waste of resources
item.description: Instead of building a new terminal at Vizhinjam the Centre must invest more to improve the efficiency of Cochin port writes Sudarshan Rodriguez
item.itunes:subtitle: Instead of building a new terminal at Vizhinjam the Centre must invest more to improve the efficiency of Cochin port writes Sudarshan Rodriguez
item.itunes:summary: Instead of building a new terminal at Vizhinjam the Centre must invest more to improve the efficiency of Cochin port writes Sudarshan Rodriguez

item.title: Investment on agenda HindiChini buy buy could be a reality
item.description: Whether Chinas moves towards us are strategic or tactical India should build synergies with it in areas where both sides benefit writes Kanwal Sibal
item.itunes:subtitle: Whether Chinas moves towards us are strategic or tactical India should build synergies with it in areas where both sides benefit writes Kanwal Sibal
item.itunes:summary: Whether Chinas moves towards us are strategic or tactical India should build synergies with it in areas where both sides benefit writes Kanwal Sibal

item.title: Is Mumbai ready for its own version of Times Square
item.description: Times Square is not just about razzledazzle but a metaphor of a lifestyle and culture of NYC It is unclear which sort of tourists the Mumbai version will attract if the other attributes are ill defined or missing writes Ayaz Memon
item.itunes:subtitle: Times Square is not just about razzledazzle but a metaphor of a lifestyle and culture of NYC It is unclear which sort of tourists the Mumbai version will attract if the other attributes are ill defined or missing writes Ayaz Memon
item.itunes:summary: Times Square is not just about razzledazzle but a metaphor of a lifestyle and culture of NYC It is unclear which sort of tourists the Mumbai version will attract if the other attributes are ill defined or missing writes Ayaz Memon

item.title: The universal immunisation plan needs a booster dose
item.description: India continues to face challenges despite making progress in the health sector There has been a significant fall in maternal deaths but the country still has the highest number of newborn deaths NK Ganguly writes
item.itunes:subtitle: India continues to face challenges despite making progress in the health sector There has been a significant fall in maternal deaths but the country still has the highest number of newborn deaths NK Ganguly writes
item.itunes:summary: India continues to face challenges despite making progress in the health sector There has been a significant fall in maternal deaths but the country still has the highest number of newborn deaths NK Ganguly writes

item.title: Theyre not as serene as they seem to be
item.description: Labour practices in tea estates in West Bengal and NorthEast India are nothing short of modernday feudalism Joseph Wheeler and Francesca Feruglio write
item.itunes:subtitle: Labour practices in tea estates in West Bengal and NorthEast India are nothing short of modernday feudalism Joseph Wheeler and Francesca Feruglio write

item.title: Govt should agree to phase out greenhouse gases
item.description: India must say yes to the formation of a contact group under the Montreal Protocol that will begin discussing the details of the HFC phasedown writes Jairam Ramesh

item.title: What does Brandon Humans of New York Stantons popularity signify
item.description: Empathy is what sets him apart as a journalist A sense of realism is whats unique in this artist You would agree that its not everyday that an independent writerphotographer lands up in Delhis Connaught Place and a large crowd gathers to listen to him Truly something right
item.itunes:subtitle: Empathy is what sets him apart as a journalist A sense of realism is whats unique in this artist You would agree that its not everyday that an independent writerphotographer lands up in Delhis Connaught Place and a large crowd gathers to listen to him Tru

item.title: The future is renewable not radioactive
item.description: India and Australia have signed a nuclear cooperation agreement that may open the door for uranium sales However obstacles remain and claims of an economic bonanza for both countries ignore facts

item.title: Ordinary voices Findings from a Bohra online poll
item.description: A majority of the respondents said they were spiritually pained when the dispute over succession broke out in the open They talked about spiritual paralysis and betrayal writes Manoj Nair
item.itunes:subtitle: A majority of the respondents said they were spiritually pained when the dispute over succession broke out in the open They talked about spiritual paralysis and betrayal writes Manoj Nair
item.itunes:summary: A majority of the respondents said they were spiritually pained when the dispute over succession broke out in the open They talked about spiritual paralysis and betrayal writes Manoj Nair

item.title: Americas West Asia myopia continues
item.description: Barack Obamas plan to form a coalition to tackle ISIS sounds more like George W Bushs flawed War on Terror writes Viju Cherian
item.itunes:subtitle: Barack Obamas plan to form a coalition to tackle ISIS sounds more like George W Bushs flawed War on Terror writes Viju Cherian
item.itunes:summary: Barack Obamas plan to form a coalition to tackle ISIS sounds more like George W Bushs flawed War on Terror writes Viju Cherian

item.title: Dredging the Ganga will upset its ecosystem
item.description: Rivers when used for commercial navigation are at anbsp risk of different kinds of pollutions The Ganga already struggling from very high levels of domestic and industrial pollutants can certainly do without an additional source of pollution
item.itunes:subtitle: Rivers when used for commercial navigation are at anbsp risk of different kinds of pollutions The Ganga already struggling from very high levels of domestic and industrial pollutants can certainly do without an additional source of pollution
item.itunes:summary: Rivers when used for commercial navigation are at anbsp risk of different kinds of pollutions The Ganga already struggling from very high levels of domestic and industrial pollutants can certainly do without an additional source of pollution

item.title: There should be a coolingoff period for exjudges
item.description: After retirement many judges join lucrative arbitration work which I think should also be subjected to a coolingoff period Instead of doing this they can take up other challenges writes Mool Chand Sharma
item.itunes:subtitle: After retirement many judges join lucrative arbitration work which I think should also be subjected to a coolingoff period Instead of doing this they can take up other challenges writes Mool Chand Sharma
item.itunes:summary: After retirement many judges join lucrative arbitration work which I think should also be subjected to a coolingoff period Instead of doing this they can take up other challenges writes Mool Chand Sharma

item.title: IndiaJapan ties blossom at the confluence of ModiAbenomics
item.description: Narendra Modis visit to Japan has created a new paradigm of cooperation between the two countries Modi and Japanese PM Shinzo Abe are decisive leaders aiming at accelerating growth momentum writes NK Singh
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modis visit to Japan has created a new paradigm of cooperation between the two countries Modi and Japanese PM Shinzo Abe are decisive leaders aiming at accelerating growth momentum writes NK Singh
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modis visit to Japan has created a new paradigm of cooperation between the two countries Modi and Japanese PM Shinzo Abe are decisive leaders aiming at accelerating growth momentum writes NK Singh

item.title: Dear Chetan Bhagat you suggest homosexuality must be tolerated Why
item.description: Surely liberties are grounded in the doctrine of humanity not numbers and even if there are 10 queer people it is reason enough to grant them their due A letter by Dhruba Jyoti Purkait
item.itunes:subtitle: Surely liberties are grounded in the doctrine of humanity not numbers and even if there are 10 queer people it is reason enough to grant them their due A letter by Dhruba Jyoti Purkait
item.itunes:summary: Surely liberties are grounded in the doctrine of humanity not numbers and even if there are 10 queer people it is reason enough to grant them their due A letter by Dhruba Jyoti Purkait

item.title: The Rest cannot be passive spectators
item.description: While the European powers fought among themselves Asian African and Arab nations were the oppressed majority whose resources were used to enrich the West Developing countries should counter the Wests dominance by taking a more active role in world affairs
item.itunes:subtitle: While the European powers fought among themselves Asian African and Arab nations were the oppressed majority whose resources were used to enrich the West Developing countries should counter the Wests dominance by taking a more active role in world affairs
item.itunes:summary: While the European powers fought among themselves Asian African and Arab nations were the oppressed majority whose resources were used to enrich the West Developing countries should counter the Wests dominance by taking a more active role in world affairs
